    Data Archives and Policies

    We strive to make all codes and data publically available. We use github to share codes and manuals and some of our datasets are published on the GFZ Data Portal or Zenodo.

    If you use any of the code or data, please cite our corresponding peer-reviewed manuscripts.

    Codes and manuals are grouped into:

    PC (PointCloud)

    FacetFlowNetwork, PulseWaves

    PC KdTree comparison

    DEM (Digital Elevation Models)

    RiverClusterAnalysis TopoMetricUncertainty MFD Routing TanDEM and SRTM DEM

    Environmental Data

    RiverPebbles

    Time Series Analysis and Extreme Events

    CorrCoef
